metadata.products: VK2; VM2; VN2; VR2; VU2; VT2; VS2; VG2

body.body: The two front fixings for the secondary air injection valve covers have increased to 25 mm from engine number 791976 (all markets except Brazil) or 792241 (Brazil only) and are not retrofittable. The rear fixings remain unchanged at 20 mm.
Therefore if the camshaft cover is replaced on models up to engine number 791975 (ROW) or 792240 (Brazil only), discard the two front 20 mm fixings and replace with new 25 mm fixings.
To facilitate this a parts kit has been released consisting of the following:
Parts Kit T1269500 - Kit, Cam Cover
T1265518 - Cam Cover, Machined, SAI, Wet Paint
T3200190 - Bolt, RHHF, M6 x 25, SLV
The torque figure remains unchanged at
When ordering replacement parts, refer to the EPC
When ordering replacement parts, refer to the EPC.
Please mark your copy of the Service Manual with this information.

Please mark your copy of the Service Manual with this information. For electronic service manuals, store this information in a readily accessible place and refer to it often. This information will be included in the next service manual update.
